Package com.seabattle.model

Class GridPaneControl

java.lang.Object
com.seabattle.model.GridPaneControl
public class GridPaneControl extends Object
Class defines methods of setting image on GridPane and getting objects from it
Author:
Yaroslava Kozhemiako

    • getNodeFromGridPane

      public static javafx.scene.Node getNodeFromGridPane(javafx.scene.layout.GridPane gridPane, int column, int row)
      gets object from GridPane
      Parameters:
      gridPane - GridPane consists of objects
      column - column of an object
      row - row of an object
      Returns:
      object of GridPane in the specified row and column or null, if there is no object

    • setEmptyImage

      public static void setEmptyImage(int row, int column, int length, javafx.scene.control.Label[][] shipsLabel, javafx.scene.image.Image emptyCell)
      sets empty images around the sunken ship
      Parameters:
      row - row to set
      column - far left column to set
      length - length of the ship to set
      shipsLabel - array of Labels to set images in
      emptyCell - image to set
